resource_requirements.ncpus: Number of required cpus per task
resource_requirements.walltime: Walltime for this job, in minutes
resource_requirements.memory: Memory in megabytes for each cpu

software_requirements.MPI: Message Passing Interface (optional, for parallel execution)

other.batch_jobs: BatchJobs package for R (optional, for managing jobs)
other.slurm: Simple Linux Utility for Resource Management (required for job scheduling and execution)
